title.rendered: Godflesh ya tienen todo atado para su nuevo EP: ‘Decline & Fall’

content.rendered:
Las expectativas ante el regreso de los titanes británicos del industrial Godflesh no podían ser más altas tras las declaraciones de Justin K. Broadkick en la que adelantaba una «vuelta a las raíces» y a un sonido más brutal y minimalista. Ahora, ya conocemos un poco más los detalles de este trabajo que está previsto que se edite en septiembre de este año.

Finalmente no se titulará A World Lit By Fire como inicialmente se planteaba sino Decline & Fall y tendrá formato de EP. Estará formado por cuatro temas más dos bonus tracks para la edición japonesa. Por otro lado, según en una reciente entrevista del grupo a la radio Le 106, Justin K. Broadkick ha comentado que el disco será bastante similar a los dos/tres primeros trabajos del grupo, con un «sonido agresivo y minimalista».

Este es el tracklist del EP:

01. Ringer
02. Dogbite
03. Playing With Fire
04. Decline & Fall
+ 2 Japan-only bonus tracks
Read more at http://www.blabbermouth.net/news/godflesh-to-release-decline-fall-ep/#vb1PyWfKjM1cU9uC.99
«It’s getting straight back to the core of what this is all about. And I think having a break from it has probably even more inspired… It’s like refocusing and obviously, we’re somewhat older and wiser. It’s gonna be a really interesting record. It’s extremely minimal and very, very brutal — a fairly unforgiving record, really, I think.»
Read more at http://www.blabbermouth.net/news/godflesh-to-release-decline-fall-ep/#vb1PyWfKjM1cU9uC.99
«It’s getting straight back to the core of what this is all about. And I think having a break from it has probably even more inspired… It’s like refocusing and obviously, we’re somewhat older and wiser. It’s gonna be a really interesting record. It’s extremely minimal and very, very brutal — a fairly unforgiving record, really, I think.»
Read more at http://www.blabbermouth.net/news/godflesh-to-release-decline-fall-ep/#vb1PyWfKjM1cU9uC.99
«It’s getting straight back to the core of what this is all about. And I think having a break from it has probably even more inspired… It’s like refocusing and obviously, we’re somewhat older and wiser. It’s gonna be a really interesting record. It’s extremely minimal and very, very brutal — a fairly unforgiving record, really, I think.»
Read more at http://www.blabbermouth.net/news/godflesh-to-release-decline-fall-ep/#vb1PyWfKjM1cU9uC.99
«It’s getting straight back to the core of what this is all about. And I think having a break from it has probably even more inspired… It’s like refocusing and obviously, we’re somewhat older and wiser. It’s gonna be a really interesting record. It’s extremely minimal and very, very brutal — a fairly unforgiving record, really, I think.»
Read more at http://www.blabbermouth.net/news/godflesh-to-release-decline-fall-ep/#vb1PyWfKjM1cU9uC.99
In an interview with the French radio station Le 106, Justin K. Broadrick stated about the band’s forthcoming album — which is tentatively titled «A World Lit Only By Fire» and due in September— «It will be [musically] similar to the first two or three [GODFLESH albums]. I just think, like we’re playing these shows, we feel very pure about we’re doing and honoring the initial intentions with what we originally set out to do. Which, I think, like most bands and musicians and all the rest of it, by the time you get on to your fourth album, it’s somewhat of a dilution going on to what you initially tried to achieve. It will definitely sound aggressive and it probably won’t sound like any of the other records we’ve made, but it will have the minimalism of the first few records.»
Read more at http://www.blabbermouth.net/news/godflesh-to-release-decline-fall-ep/#vb1PyWfKjM1cU9uC.99
  1. Ringer
  2. Dogbite
  3. Playing With Fire
  4. Decline & Fall

+ 2 bonus traks en la edición japonesa

Actualización 22/05/14: Ya tenemos un primer tema de adelanto, Ringer. Os dejamos el widget de Soundcloud donde podréis escucharlo.

In an interview with the French radio station Le 106, Justin K. Broadrick stated about the band’s forthcoming album — which is tentatively titled «A World Lit Only By Fire» and due in September— «It will be [musically] similar to the first two or three [GODFLESH albums]. I just think, like we’re playing these shows, we feel very pure about we’re doing and honoring the initial intentions with what we originally set out to do. Which, I think, like most bands and musicians and all the rest of it, by the time you get on to your fourth album, it’s somewhat of a dilution going on to what you initially tried to achieve. It will definitely sound aggressive and it probably won’t sound like any of the other records we’ve made, but it will have the minimalism of the first few records.»
Read more at http://www.blabbermouth.net/news/godflesh-to-release-decline-fall-ep/#vb1PyWfKjM1cU9uC.99
